The vigilante doesnâ€™t take the usual -4 penalty on attack rolls made to deal nonlethal damage with weapons that normally deal lethal damage. In addition, the vigilante gains a +1 bonus on all attack and damage rolls for attacks that deal only nonlethal damage and have no secondary effects (such as poison).

This bonus increases by 1 at 5th level and every 3 levels thereafter, to a maximum of +5 at 20th level.
